name: Sheet Pan Smoked Sausage, Apple, and Root Veggie Dinner
author: Hillshire Farm(R) Brand
summary: The smoked sausage flavor you love joins your favorite winter produce in this easy meal, in partnership with Hillshire Farm® Brand.
ingredients: 1 small red onion, peeled and cut into 8 wedges
1 (12 ounce) package Hillshire Farm® Rope Smoked Sausage, cut in 1/2" bias-cut slices
1 medium Honeycrisp apple, cut into 12 wedges
directions: Place a large baking pan in oven
Toss carrots, Brussels sprouts, and onion with oil, rosemary, salt, and pepper in a large bowl
Arrange vegetable mixture and sausage on the preheated pan in a single layer
Bake in the preheated oven until just tender, about 20 minutes
Add apple to pan; broil until apple is tender and vegetables are slightly caramelized, 5 to 6 minutes
Squeeze lemon over pan and sprinkle with parsley
